section.title: packages creating new Package
section.para: Once a Package has been loaded into xTuple ERP, you have the ability to review the Package's contents on the Package screen. You won't have the ability to edit the Package, because the essential details about a Package are defined at the Package level. However, it is helpful to be able to view Package details for general information and debugging purposes. For additional information, please see the CreateUpdaterPackages wiki page.
To view the details of a specific Package, select the VIEW button from the Packages master list. The following screen will appear:
When viewing a Package, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Review name of developer who created package. This could be the name of an internal individual or company name.
Verify whether the package is enabled.
This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering Notes related to the Package.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:
To review Contents included in a Package, select the Contents tab at the top of the "Package" screen. The following screen will appear:
Contents is a directory of script components contained in the package. Information listed includes component Type, Name and Description.
To review packages required to load this package, select the Requirements tab at the top of the "Package" screen. The following screen will appear:
The "Requirements" list displays information on all packages required to load the package including, package name, description, and version.
To locate packages dependent on this package, select the "Dependencies" tab. The following screen will appear:
The "Dependencies" list displays information on all packages dependent on this package including, package name, description, and version.
